Content:: Cho Jung-hyun (Korean: 조정현; 12 November 1969 – 10 July 2022)[1] was a South Korean footballer who played as a forward. Cho spent most of his club career playing for Yukong Elephants / Bucheon SK. He has played in the 1992 Summer Olympics.[2] At the time of his death he was manager of Gyeongnam FC U-18 Jinju High School.
